sentence.Network_en: He signed the confession under duress .
sentence.Network_cn: 他出于被迫在供状上签了字。

sentence.Network_en: He claimed that he signed the confession under duress.
sentence.Network_cn: 他说他是被迫在认罪书上签字的.

sentence.Network_en: Those who acted under duress shall go unpunished.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 法律英语专业词汇汇总 ... 欺诈 fraud 胁迫 duress 乘人之危 taking advantage of others' precarious position.
英语专业八级核心词汇_普特英语听力 ... dubious adj 可疑的不确定的 duress n 强迫监禁 edifice n 大厦大建筑物.
暗黑2符文之语大全(一)完整页_乐游网 ... Stone 石块 Duress 强制 40% 快速恢复打击 Prudence 谨慎.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... perdure v 持久；永存 duress n 强迫；束缚 dour a 性情冷酷的.

list.abs: 所谓经济胁迫(Economic Duress) ,是指合同的一方当事人在订立合同时, 滥用其优势地位以及相对方的需要，以暴力强迫以外的方式迫 …
duress ... n. 强迫者 under duress 【律】被迫, 在别人挟持下 Forcible confinement. 语源.
... without warning adv 毫无预兆地，无预警地 make a confession without duress v 不打自招 v without foundation 毫无根据.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the sense 'harshness, severity, cruel treatment'): via Old French from Latin duritia, from durus 'hard'

entry.def: To do something under duress means to do it because someone forces you to do it or threatens you.

example.ex: He thought her confession had been made under duress.
example.tran: 他认为她是被刑讯逼供的。

auth_sentence.content: EU is concerned that confessions were obtained under duress.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: EU is concerned that confessions were obtained under duress.

auth_sentence.content: A laborious composition, no doubt written under duress.
auth_sentence.res_content: A laborious composition, no doubt written under duress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A laborious composition, no doubt written under duress.

auth_sentence.content: There is also the possibility of economic duress.
auth_sentence.res_content: There is also the possibility of economic duress.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There is also the possibility of economic duress.

stems_affixes.word_buile: dour=dur心硬不为所动→adj.冷酷的,严厉的
dur持久,延续,坚硬+able……的→adj.持久的,耐久的
ob加强+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate……的→加强硬→顽固
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ation表名词→n.持久;期间;持续时间
dur持久,延续,坚硬+ess表名词或动词→硬压→强迫
endure[v.忍受,持久,持续]+ance表名词→n.忍耐[力],持久[力],耐久[性]

stems_affixes.value_cn: 在……的期间, 在……的时候
stems_affixes.word_buile: dur延续+ing状态→prep.在……的期间, 在……的时候
in进入+dur持久,延续,坚硬+ate使……→使成为坚硬
per贯穿+dur持久+e→v.持久, 继续

sentences.en: He claimed that he signed the confession under duress.
sentences.cn: 他说他是被迫在认罪书上签字的。
